sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Russia says it has received a huge haul of military equipment from Wagner, following the mercenary group's short-lived mutiny last month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: In a new investigation, released Ukrainian detainees tell of torture, psychological abuse and forced labor at the hands of their Russian captors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Joe Biden has arrived in Finland, the last stop of his European tour after attending a NATO summit in Lithuania.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: MEPs say the European Commission's plans to establish an inter-institutional ethics body are unambitious and unsatisfactory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Russia says it has received over 2,000 items of military hardware from Wagner following

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: the mercenary group's short-lived insurrection last month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The haul includes tanks, rocket launchers and some 2,500 tons of ammunition and around 20,000 small arms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The Defense Ministry has released images of the military equipment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The disarming of Wagner appears to reflect Russian efforts to defuse the threat posed by the mercenary group and appears to herald an end to its operations on the battlefield in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: It also comes amid speculation over the fate of Wagner chief Yevgeny Prigozhin and the terms of the deal that ended the armed rebellion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: On Monday, the Kremlin revealed the Russian President Vladimir Putin had met Prigozhin and some 34 Wagner senior officials just five days after the aborted mutiny.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Putin said Wagner troops could choose to sign contracts with the Defense Ministry, move to Belarus or retire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: At least one person has died and four injured from falling debris after Ukrainian forces shot down Russian drones over Kyiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: A swarm of Iranian-made Shahed drones targeted the capital overnight and all were successfully downed by defensive forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: At least two apartment blocks and other infrastructure were damaged.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: There were similar incidents in other areas of Ukraine, where in total around 20 drones and two Kalibr cruise missiles were destroyed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This woman is one of thousands of Ukrainian civilians who are or have been held in Russian prisons since the start of Moscow's invasion. An Associated Press investigation has uncovered a network of formal and informal prisons in Russia and the occupied territories. Detainees report torture, psychological abuse and even forced labor. Привязали руки и ноги к офисному стулу и били двухлитровой бутылкой с водой по голове.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Чередовалось это с надеванием пакета целлофанового на голову.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: На шее заматывали скотчем, а один из людей держал вот здесь через пакет, чтобы я не могла вдохнуть даже в пакете.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: С другими преступниками Елена Яхопова была заставлена дыркать в эти трещины для русской армии. Я не могла вдохнуть даже в пакете. revealed torture chambers in buildings and basements in numerous localities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: His house is now empty.

sentences.sentence: Some 400 civilians have been released, along with soldiers swapped in prisoner exchanges ukraine estimates there are about 10 000 civilians in russian prisons president joe biden has arrived in finland the newest member of nato for a meeting of nordic

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: countries it's the end of his three-stop tour having just left the NATO summit in Lithuania, where he said Western allies will not waver in defense of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Speaking before he left Vilnius, Biden cast the struggle against Russian aggression as one of the world's central challenges requiring a broad coalition of countries to stand in defense of freedom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We must never forget how much this matters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And never, never give up on a better tomorrow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The defense of freedom is not the work of a day or a year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's the calling of our lifetime, of all time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We are steel for the struggle ahead.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Our unity will not falter, I promise you." Ukraine's President Zelenskyy leaves the summit with a mixed bag.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He failed to get a timeframe for NATO membership, but has a new NATO-Ukraine Council and a three-part package to bring Ukraine closer to the Alliance. And the summit produced another illustration of the quest for security.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Sweden, which will be participating in the Nordic talks with Biden, was finally given the green light to join NATO after Turkey dropped its objections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: objections. The European Commission's plans for a new, inter-institutional ethics body are unambitious

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: and unsatisfactory, according to members of the European Parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Unveiled by the Commission in June, the planned ethics body is a response to the Qatagate cash for influence scandal that tarnished EU institutions image and revealed gaping holes in their integrity rules. But MEP said today in a resolution that the body would lack independence and have no real powers to investigate or punish violations. Corruption is not an issue of morality. It's not an ethical issue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It's a matter of survival for our democratic institutions in very turbulent times.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Corrupt institutions are weak.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: If people are to trust in democracy, they must have public trust in democratic institutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The Commission's proposal has divided the Parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Right-leaning groups have refrained from criticism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: But left and centrist groups have called for greater investigating and sanctioning powers, more protection for whistleblowers and stricter transparency rules for NGOs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Declaration of assets, transparency of who we meet, who pays when we travel, sanctioning non-ethical behaviors, things that should already have been in place for quite some time, but we are left to the goodwill of the vast majority of good people. But goodwill and good people is not enough when there is mistrust in our institutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: MEPs have been calling for more stringent ethical rules since 2021, before the so-called Katagate scandal erupted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The Parliament will vote on its final position in Strasbourg on Thursday to open negotiations with member states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Torrential downpours this week have led to the deaths of 100 people and unleashed havoc

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: in northern India. Officials have described it as the worst monsoon the country has experienced in decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: A massive downpour in Delhi left large swathes of the national capital submerged, including several key government buildings. At one point, Delhi received its highest amount of rain on a single day in July since the 1980s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: The James Webb Space Telescope is celebrating one year of stunning cosmic photographs and

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: galactic insights.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Webb is the largest and most powerful astronomical observatory ever launched into space and has helped shed new light on our universe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: NASA unveiled its latest snapshots on Wednesday, revealing dramatic close-ups of dozens of stars at the moment of birth.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Around 50 baby stars can be seen in a cloud complex 390 light-years away.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: German rock metal band Rammstein filled the Puskas Arena again in Budapest after 12 years, but this time accompanied by a sex scandal backstage. Tens of thousands of people traveled from surrounding countries to Budapest to see the band.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some fans, however, were not deterred by the sexual harassment scandal involving singer Till Lindemann.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The entire media was trying to stigmatize the band and I didn't think it's fair. I mean, they only took one side of the story and they overdramatized it in my opinion. Maybe some things happened, maybe some things didn't, but I as a fan am not affected by this.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

It's been another successful day of cycling for Belgian sprinter Jesper Philipsen after he secured his fourth stage win in this year's Tour de France on Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Even without the help of lead out man Mathieu Van Der Poel, Philipsen proved to be the strongest in the last kilometre of the 11th stage of the competition, spanning from Clermont-Ferrand to Moulin in central France.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: This latest victory brings Philipsen's career tally up to six.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: As it stands, there were no major changes in the rankings. Jonas Venego kept a 17-second lead over two-time champion Tadej Pogacar and the yellow jersey, while Jai Hindley remained in third place.
